property.name: engineList
property.shortdesc: The available color engines.

property.name: cmsSettingsList
property.shortdesc: A list of valid color management system settings configurations.

property.name: workingSpaceCMYKList
property.shortdesc: A list of valid CMYK color profiles.

property.name: workingSpaceRGBList
property.shortdesc: A list of valid RGB color profiles.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the ColorSetting &#40;a Application).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: cmykPolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy for handling colors in a CMYK color model, including reading and embedding color profiles, resolving mismatches between embedded color profiles and the working space, and moving colors between documents.

property.name: enableColorManagement
property.shortdesc: If true, enables color management.

property.name: engine
property.shortdesc: The color management module &#40;CMM) for mapping color space gamuts between documents.

property.name: mismatchAskWhenOpening
property.shortdesc: If true, displays a prompt when opening a file whose embedded color profile does not match the current working space. The prompt provides the option to override the default mismatch behavior.

property.name: mismatchAskWhenPasting
property.shortdesc: If true, displays a prompt when importing an object &#40;via pasting, drag-and-drop, or other similar methods) whose colors do not match the current working space. The prompt provides the option to override the default mismatch behavior.

property.name: missingAskWhenOpening
property.shortdesc: If true, displays a prompt when opening a file that does not have an embedded color profile. The prompt provides the option to assign a color profile.

property.name: rgbPolicy
property.shortdesc: The policy for handling colors in an RGB color model, including reading and embedding color profiles, handling mismatches between embedded color profiles and the working space, and moving colors from one document to another.

property.name: cmsSettings
property.shortdesc: The current color management system settings configuration. Note: For information on possible values, see CMS settings list.

property.name: cmsSettingsPath
property.shortdesc: The file path of the CSF file to use.

property.name: useBPC
property.shortdesc: If true, uses black point compensation to ensure that shadow detail is preserved by simulating the full dynamic range of the output device.

property.name: workingSpaceCMYK
property.shortdesc: The current CMYK profile.

property.name: workingSpaceRGB
property.shortdesc: The current RGB profile.

property.name: intent
property.shortdesc: The default rendering intent.

property.name: accurateLABSpots
property.shortdesc: If true, uses LAB alternates for spot colors when available.

property.name: idealizedBlackToScreen
property.shortdesc: If true, uses idealized black for CMYK-to-RGB or CMYK-to-Gray conversions to the screen.

property.name: idealizedBlackToExport
property.shortdesc: If true, uses idealized black for CMYK-to-RGB or CMYK-to-Gray conversions to print or export.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ColorSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
